title: Unskilled/unexperienced players in ranked.
body: Okay I can't be the only one who has to deal with this crap... This Nunu is somehow Level 30 with less than 100 (apparently less than 50) wins. WHY IS HE ALLOWED TO PLAY RANKED!? Riot please don't let this be a thing. Introduce a system where people need like at least 100 wins to be able to play ranked. If you can't get 100 wins before getting to level 30 Then you shouldn't be able to jump straight into ranked. This is just getting out of hand.

replies.body: ADC Nunu jungle with no jungle item and Linadry's. Now I have seen it all.
you're in bronze 4, what did you expect? LCS plays?
No I expect people to play ranked like they're playing ranked.

at any point did you say, "nunu you should be going ap/tank" "nunu i don't think thats a good item for you".

Nah it probably went more like "OMG FUKING NOOB, YOU KNOW NOTHING, KILL YOURSELF"

haha Actually I said to him "Nunu it'd be better if you could build AP or Tank because we don't have enough tank on our team", I didn't rage at him, and in fact it didn't matter because he wouldn't communicate with the team anyway.
This is why when you sign up for league it says you have to be over 13 to play this game but this is clearly a lie...
